name: Wikimedia Big Fonts
description: Here's my big-font style for Wikimedia pages. It's incomplete (and buggy), but it could be a basis for a good style in the future. The code is very brief, I encourage you to scroll through it.
additional_info:
This user style is designed for the fonts Lato and Francois One. Both fonts are both released under the SIL Open Font License. You may download these fonts at:
  • http://www.latofonts.com/lato-free-fonts/
  • https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/francois-one
You may contact me on Twitter with feedback.
